General.Name: Whitemud Resources Inc
General.Description: Whitemud Resources Inc. engages in the management and marketing of commodities. It operates in two segments, Metakaolin and Commodities. The company markets hydrocarbon products. In addition, it is involved in the mining, processing, production, and marketing of kaolin and metakaolin products in southern Saskatchewan. Whitemud Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 6713 Fairmount Drive SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2H 0X6
